label: AB2_hP24_194_bh_fk-001
title: Low Temperature NbSe$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
NbSe$_{2}$ is in the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_hP6_194_b_f-002}{high temperature NbS$_{2}$ structure} above 40K.  Below 40K the primitive cell doubles in the $a$ and $b$ directions, and the niobium atoms are no longer equivalent, giving this structure. 
  The data for this structure was taken at 15K.
